system.description: This spell creates the illusion of a wall, floor, ceiling, or similar surface. It appears completely real when viewed, but physical objects can pass through it without resistance. When any creature uses standard actions to interact with the illusion, they get a Will save to recognize it as illusory. Disbelievers see it as a vague outline.

components.materialDescription: A bit of gauze and a wisp of smoke.

system.target: Image 1 ft. by 10 ft. by 10 ft.
